name: Slowbro
flavorText:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.flavorText:
Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.

pokemon.name: Slowking
pokemon.flavorText:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.
